snippet: The practice courts offer fans an intimate glimpse of the United States Open, but an overhaul to the tennis center could mean more structured viewing.
abstract: Practice courts offer fans an intimate glimpse of the United States Open, but an overhaul to the tennis center could mean more structured viewing.
lead_paragraph: The practice courts offer fans an intimate glimpse of the United States Open, but an overhaul to the tennis center could mean more structured viewing.

headline.seo: View at U.S. Open Practice Courts Is Little-Known Perk
headline.main: View at Practice Courts an Intimate but Possibly Endangered Perk
